sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d83c12c5dbb74700cbe7fb37bf9619df
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.customerAttachmentUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>source: https://snprotips.com/blog/2016/2/25/understanding-and-using-glideattachment
</description><name>customerAttachmentUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var customerAttachmentUtils = Class.create();
customerAttachmentUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
copySpecificAttachment: function(donorTable, donorID, recipientTable, recipientID, fileName, picturetype) {
			var donorAttSysID;
			var newAttRecord;
			var linkToNewRecord;
			var attDataRecord;
			var newDocRecord;
			var attRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
			attRecord.addQuery('table_name', donorTable);
			attRecord.addQuery('table_sys_id', donorID);
			attRecord.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
			attRecord.query();
			while (attRecord.next()) {
				donorAttSysID = attRecord.getValue('sys_id');
				newAttRecord = this._copyRecord(attRecord, picturetype);
				newAttRecord.setValue('table_name', recipientTable);
				newAttRecord.setValue('table_sys_id', recipientID);
				newAttRecord.update();
				linkToNewRecord = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + newAttRecord.getLink();
				attDataRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment_doc');
				attDataRecord.addQuery('sys_attachment', donorAttSysID);
				attDataRecord.query();
				while (attDataRecord.next()) {
					newDocRecord = this._copyRecord(attDataRecord);
					newDocRecord.setValue('sys_attachment', newAttRecord.getValue('sys_id'));
					newDocRecord.update();
				}
			}
			//gs.print(linkToNewRecord);
		},

		_copyRecord: function(record, pictureType) {
			var recordElement;
			var recordElementName;
			var recordTable = record.getTableName();
			var recordFields = record.getFields();
			var newRecord = new GlideRecord(recordTable);
			newRecord.initialize();
			for (var i = 0; i < recordFields.size(); i++) {
				recordElement = recordFields.get(i);
				if(recordElement.getName() != 'sys_id' && recordElement.getName() != 'number')
					{
					if(recordElement.getName()=='file_name'){
						newRecord.setValue('file_name', pictureType);
					}
					else{
						recordElementName = recordElement.getName();
						newRecord.setValue(recordElementName, record.getValue(recordElementName));
					}
				}
			}
			var newSysId = newRecord.insert();
			return newRecord;
		},
    type: 'customerAttachmentUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jbYates</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-20 02:10:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d83c12c5dbb74700cbe7fb37bf9619df</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>customerAttachmentUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d83c12c5dbb74700cbe7fb37bf9619df</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jbYates</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-20 03:20:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_attached_image</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Check for Attachment on Insert</name><order>10</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var url = '/u_attached_image.do?sys_id=-1&sysparm_query=u_equipment=' + current.u_equipment + '^u_related_record=' + current.u_related_record + '^u_related_record_table=' + current.u_related_record_table;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
		gr.addQuery("table_name", "ZZ_YYu_attached_image");
		gr.addQuery("table_sys_id", current.sys_id.toString());
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			current.setValue("u_has_attachment","true");
			//gs.setRedirect(url);
			return true;
			
		}
		else{
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		//	gs.addErrorMessage('You must attach a picture to continue');
			
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jbYates</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 02:53:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!$/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3f765381db5cdf40cbe7fb37bf96191e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check for Attachment on Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3f765381db5cdf40cbe7fb37bf96191e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>amKatulak</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-21 18:17:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3f765381db5cdf40cbe7fb37bf96191e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.imageAttachmentAjax</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>imageAttachmentAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var imageAttachmentAjax = Class.create();
imageAttachmentAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	hasAttachment : function(){
		gs.log('checking for attachment', 'imageAttachmentAjax.hasAttachment');
		var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_tableName');
		var tableSYSID = this.getParameter('sysparm_tableSYS');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
		gr.addQuery("table_name", tableName);
		gr.addQuery("table_sys_id", tableSYSID);
		gr.query();
		if (gr.hasNext()) {
			return true;
		}
		else{
			return false;
		}
	},
	type: 'imageAttachmentAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jbYates</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-14 02:31:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1d509f0ddb1cdf40cbe7fb37bf9619e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>imageAttachmentAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1d509f0ddb1cdf40cbe7fb37bf9619e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jbYates</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-14 02:37:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_attached_image</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_attached_image">u_equipmentISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_equipment" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Build Document ID and Table from Equip</name><order>50</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_attached_image</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Copy Attachment on Insert</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var currentSYS = current.getValue('sys_id');
	gs.log('currentSYS: ' + currentSYS, 'Attached Image');
	var targetSYS = current.getValue('u_related_record');
	gs.log('targetSYS: ' + targetSYS, 'Attached Image');
	var targetTable = current.getValue('u_related_record_table');
	gs.log('targetTable: ' + "ZZ_YY" + targetTable, 'Attached Image');
	deleteCurrentRecord("ZZ_YYu_cmdb_ci_equipment", targetSYS, current.u_picture_type);
	var copyAttachment = new global.customerAttachmentUtils();
	copyAttachment.copySpecificAttachment("ZZ_YYu_attached_image", currentSYS, "ZZ_YY" + targetTable, targetSYS, 'u_image', current.u_picture_type);
})(current, previous);

function deleteCurrentRecord(recipientTable, recipientID, pictureType){
	var targetAttachment = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
	targetAttachment.addQuery('table_name', recipientTable);
	targetAttachment.addQuery('table_sys_id', recipientID);
	targetAttachment.addQuery('file_name', pictureType);
	targetAttachment.query();
	targetAttachment.next();
	targetAttachment.deleteRecord();
}
function copySpecificAttachment(donorTable, donorID, recipientTable, recipientID, fileName, picturetype) {
	var donorAttSysID;
	var newAttRecord;
	var linkToNewRecord;
	var attDataRecord;
	var newDocRecord;
	var attRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
	attRecord.addQuery('table_name', donorTable);
	attRecord.addQuery('table_sys_id', donorID);
	attRecord.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
	attRecord.query();
	while (attRecord.next()) {
		donorAttSysID = attRecord.getValue('sys_id');
		newAttRecord = copyRecord(attRecord, picturetype);
		newAttRecord.setValue('table_name', recipientTable);
		newAttRecord.setValue('table_sys_id', recipientID);
		newAttRecord.update();
		linkToNewRecord = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + newAttRecord.getLink();
		attDataRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment_doc');
		attDataRecord.addQuery('sys_attachment', donorAttSysID);
		attDataRecord.query();
		while (attDataRecord.next()) {
			newDocRecord = copyRecord(attDataRecord);
			newDocRecord.setValue('sys_attachment', newAttRecord.getValue('sys_id'));
			newDocRecord.update();
		}
	}
}
function copyRecord(record, pictureType) {
	var recordElement;
	var recordElementName;
	var recordTable = record.getTableName();
	var recordFields = record.getFields();
	var newRecord = new GlideRecord(recordTable);
	newRecord.initialize();
	for (var i = 0; i < recordFields.size(); i++) {
		recordElement = recordFields.get(i);
		if(recordElement.getName() != 'sys_id' && recordElement.getName() != 'number')
			{
			if(recordElement.getName()=='file_name'){
				newRecord.setValue('file_name', pictureType);
			}
			else{
				recordElementName = recordElement.getName();
				newRecord.setValue(recordElementName, record.getValue(recordElementName));
			}
		}
	}
	var newSysId = newRecord.insert();
	return newRecord;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jbYates</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-20 01:07:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>774190f01f1310005a3637b8ec8b70ef</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!$/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>92fdcec9db774700cbe7fb37bf9619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Copy Attachment on Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_92fdcec9db774700cbe7fb37bf9619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jbYates</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-22 14:37:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=92fdcec9db774700cbe7fb37bf9619b9"/></record_update>
